subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Shaun Micheel’s double eagle was only the second in United States Open history. Micheel said he would give the ball to his mother, who is in the final stages of cancer.
snippet: Shaun Micheel’s double eagle was only the second in United States Open history. Micheel said he would give the ball to his mother, who is in the final stages of cancer.
